Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections

Class SDPConnection

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections.UDPConnection<SDPMessage>
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections.SDPConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.AutoCloseable, Connection, Listenable<SDPMessage>, MessageReceiver<SDPMessage>, SDPReceiver, SDPSender, SocketHolder
Direct Known Subclasses:
SCPConnection
public class SDPConnection
extends UDPConnection<SDPMessage>
implements SDPReceiver, SDPSender
A UDP socket connection that talks SDP to SpiNNaker.

  • Constructor Details

    • SDPConnection

      public SDPConnection​(HasChipLocation remoteChip, java.net.InetAddress remoteHost, java.lang.Integer remotePort) throws java.io.IOException
      Parameters:
      remoteChip - Which chip are we talking to? This is not necessarily the chip that is connected to the Ethernet connector on the SpiNNaker board, or even on the same board.
      remoteHost - The address of the SpiNNaker board to route UDP packets to.
      remotePort - The UDP port on the SpiNNaker board to use.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If anything goes wrong with the setup.

    • SDPConnection

      public SDPConnection​(HasChipLocation remoteChip, java.net.InetAddress localHost, java.lang.Integer localPort, java.net.InetAddress remoteHost, java.lang.Integer remotePort) throws java.io.IOException
      Parameters:
      remoteChip - Which chip are we talking to? This is not necessarily the chip that is connected to the Ethernet connector on the SpiNNaker board, or even on the same board.
      localHost - The local host address to bind to, or null to bind to all relevant local addresses.
      localPort - The local port to bind to, or null to pick a random free port.
      remoteHost - The address of the SpiNNaker board to route UDP packets to.
      remotePort - The UDP port on the SpiNNaker board to use.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If anything goes wrong with the setup (e.g., if the local port is specified and already bound).

      public void send​(SDPMessage sdpMessage) throws java.io.IOException
      Description copied from interface: SDPSender
      Sends an SDP message down this connection.
      Specified by:
      send in interface SDPSender
      Parameters:
      sdpMessage - The SDP message to be sent
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error sending the message.

    • receiveMessage

      public SDPMessage receiveMessage​(java.lang.Integer timeout) throws java.io.IOException, java.io.InterruptedIOException
      Description copied from interface: MessageReceiver
      Receives a SpiNNaker message from this connection. Blocks until a message has been received, or a timeout occurs.
      Specified by:
      receiveMessage in interface MessageReceiver<SDPMessage>
      Parameters:
      timeout - The time in seconds to wait for the message to arrive; if null, will wait forever, or until the connection is closed.
      Returns:
      the received message
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error receiving the message
      java.io.InterruptedIOException

    • getChip

      public ChipLocation getChip()
      Returns:
      The SpiNNaker chip that we are talking to with this connection.

    • setChip

      public void setChip​(HasChipLocation chip)
      Set the SpiNNaker chip that we are talking to with this connection.
      Parameters:
      chip - The chip to talk to.
